ChapterShortDescription: Google Developers Group Nizhny Novgorod is an initiative to concentrate the efforts of many developers in and around Nizhny Novgorod to learn, share and get productive using the various Google products.
ChapterLongDec: Google Developer Group Nizhny Novgorod is inspired by GTUG/GDG Family . We started our journey in May 2015. We try to engage student developers, fresh graduates and professionals through our hack events & meetups. The motive is to create a local ecosystem of programmers & hackers in and around Nizhny Novgorod. The technology awareness is main goal for first few years of the group.
aboutGDGProgram: GDGs are local groups of developers who are specifically interested in Google products and APIs. Each local group is called a GDG chapter and can host a variety of technical activities for developers - from just a few people getting together to watch our latest videos, to large gatherings with demos and tech talks, to hackathons.
